metadata.title: CVE-2024-28567 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in open source FreeImage v.3.19.0 [r1909]allows a local attacker to cause a denial of service (DoS) via theFreeImage_CreateICCProfile() function when reading images in TIFF format.

criterions.comment: freeimage package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
